plot: Mr. Leto, a motel assistant manager, lives his life looking out onto the lives of the motel's occupants. He wishes for their lives in lieu of his own. Yet when his wish becomes granted, he comes to realize everyone has their vice.
title: Leto
plot_es: Mr. Leto, a motel assistant manager, lives his life looking out onto the lives of the motel's occupants. He wishes for their lives in lieu of his own. Yet when his wish becomes granted, he comes to realize everyone has their vice.
